title: Movietone news
brief_description: Movietone cinemagazine items include: A new series of fire extinguishers and fire prevention demonstrated; presentation of gallantry awards by the Duchess of Kent at the Royal National Lifeboat Institute; description of a new rescue boat; displays of English fashion for export; a report on cemetary damage by vandals at Basingstoke; footage of new “crazes” - surfsailing and surf-racing.
